ygData.subject: Re: Jewelcrafting and an idea
ygData.msgSnippet: I haven t tried topaz and regular silver. Last night the only problem I had with Topaz and Enchanted Silver was I didn t have enough skill.  Made a few nice
ygData.messageBody:
I haven't tried topaz and regular silver.
Last night the only problem I had with Topaz and Enchanted Silver was I
didn't have enough skill. Made a few nice Silvered Topaz Necklaces(+4 vs.
Disease) though.

Fiera Mindbender [BAD]
Erudite Enchanter-Xegony
.
